#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
long long answer(long long n)
{
    long long k = 0;
    while( n > 0) 
    {
        k++;
        n -= 9 * pow(10, k - 1) * k;
    }
    n += 9 * pow(10, k - 1) * k;
    if( n % k == 0)
    {
        long long finalNumber = pow(10, k - 1) + (n / k) - 1;
        return finalNumber % 10;
    } 
    else 
    {
        long long finalNumber = pow(10, k - 1) + (n / k);
        return static_cast<long long>((finalNumber / pow(10, k - (n % k)))) % 10;
    }
}
int main()
{
	long long test,n,k;
	scanf("%lld",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
		printf("%lld\n",answer(k));
	}
	return 0;
}
